title: (Upgraded Version) Bluetooth FM Transmitter, Sumind Wireless Radio Adapter Hands-Free Car Kit with 1.7 Inch Display, QC3.0 and Smart 2.4A Dual USB Ports, AUX Input/Output, TF Card Mp3 Player Black Normal
description: Intelligent and Fast Charging: input 12-24 Volt; Output 2 USB ports (PD 20W and QC3.0), allow for simultaneous rapid charging of 2 devices

top_reviews.title: Easy to use, decent audio quality
top_reviews.body: I bought this with little expectations because I had heard that FM transmitters had the worst audio quality. But for the money I can say it works like a charm, a great solution until I can buy the digital screen I want. Read more
